reviews.review_msg: Cliff is a great professor. He's organized on canvas, records all of his lectures incase you miss one, and is readily accessible for help outside of class. I do think that visiting him in his office hours are extremely beneficial, especially for a writing class.

There are no better professors than Trevor. The pinnacle of a good prof. Very clear lectures and assignments that were perfectly relevant to the material. Always accessible to ask Qs and gives great answers.
This man is fantastic. He gets back to your emails ASAP, communicates what you need to improve on and is overall just a great guy.
